chinese: 丝建立；逐步增强；建造 几.构造
english: build

chinese: 他通过参加演讲比赛来建立自信。
english: He has been entering speech contests to help build his confidence

chinese: v. 穿
english: wear

chinese: 她爱穿白色的大衣。
english: She loves to wear white coats

chinese: n.斑点；污点 w.发现，认出
english: spot

chinese: 这种狗的身上有很多黑色的斑点。
english: This type of dog has many black spots

chinese: 加.口红，唇膏
english: lipstick

chinese: 她正在化妆品店里试不同颜色的口红。
english: She is trying lipsticks of different colors in the makeup shop

chinese: 几小径，路径：记号，痕迹，线索 1（烟等）袅袅升起
english: trail

chinese: 自行车手正在森林小径上骑行。
english: The cyclist is riding on the forest trail

chinese: adj，傲慢的，妄自尊大的
english: arrogant

chinese: 那个傲慢的男人拒绝听从其他人的想法。
english: The arrogant man refused to listen to anyone else's ideas

chinese: 几 机车，火车头
english: locomotive

chinese: 老式火车靠煤和蒸汽提供动力。
english: Old locomotives ran on coal and steam

chinese: n.疏散，撒离
english: evacuation

chinese: 暴雨之后，一场大面积的撤离工作开展了起
english: There was a massive evacuation after the storm

chinese: D边界；边沿以近似；毗邻；与接壤；为⋯镶边
english: border

chinese: 城市与农村之间有一条明显的边界。
english: There is a distinct border between the urban and the rural areas

chinese: v.（使）旋转 n.纺织
english: spin

chinese: 我能让篮球在我的手指上转动
english: I can spin the basketball on my finger

chinese: ad）.金融的，财政的，财务的
english: financial

chinese: 华尔街是美国的金融中心。
english: Wall Street is the financial center of the United States

chinese: adj. 有说服力的
english: convincing

chinese: 猫脸上的奶油是它吃了蛋糕的有力证据。
english: The cream on the cat's face is convincing evidence that it ate the cake

chinese: n.互动
english: interaction

chinese: 通过网络，观众可以和主持人互动。
english: Audience can have interaction with TV hosts through the Internet

chinese: n. 不幸事件之后果，余波
english: aftermath

chinese: 在战争的余波中，这些可怜的村民无家可归。
english: In the aftermath of the war, these poor villagers were homeless

chinese: 几.震级；巨大；重要性；【数】量值
english: magnitude

chinese: 这里发生了一场8.0级特大地震。
english: The horrible earthquake here had a magnitude of 8.0
